A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is the best Star Wars movie I have watched till date. It is not only ingenious\, loaded with symbolism\, great character arcs\, beautiful action\, and hilarious comic time\, it also contains heart and resolve which is central to a movie which stand high on the expectations of its audience. Loved this movie. In love with Daisy Ridley all over again.\n\nP.S : Just don't watch it in 3D
